  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112178</entry>
          </identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112178</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Pridobivanje informacij</string>
            <string language="en">Digging for information</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Graben zu Information</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Creuser pour information</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escavar para a informação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scavando per informazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σκάψιμο για τις πληροφορίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cavar para la información</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učni listi so namenjeni skupinskemu delu, lahko jih prilagodite sposobnostim svojih učencev, priporočam, da napišete vodena vprašanja. Učenci se naučijo uporabljati naprave, kot so računalnik, CD predvajalnik, videorekorder in digitalni fotoaparat. Priporočam, da dejavnost razširite na dve šolski uri.</string>
            <string language="en">How to teach students about information, how to transfer/store them, finding information (using tv-guide, phonebook, internet, ...)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">informacija</string>
            <string language="en">information</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">spored</string>
            <string language="en">program</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">računalnik</string>
            <string language="en">computer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">iskanje</string>
            <string language="en">searching</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">raziskovanje</string>
            <string language="en">research</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie man Kursteilnehmer über Informationen, wie 
zu transfer/store sie unterrichtet und die Informationen findet 
(Fernsehapparat-Anleitung, phonebook, Internet verwendend...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment enseigner des étudiants au sujet de 
l'information, comment à transfer/store ils, trouvant l'information 
(utilisant le TV-GUIDE, le phonebook, l'Internet...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como ensinar estudantes sobre a informação, 
como a transfer/store ele, encontrando a informação (que usa a 
tevê-guia, o phonebook, o Internet...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come insegnare gli allievi circa le informazioni,
come a transfer/store loro, trovando le informazioni (che usando 
TV-GUIDA, phonebook, Internet...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς να διδάξει τους σπουδαστές για τις πληροφορίες, 
πώς να μεταφέρει/τους καταχωρήστε, που βρίσκουν τις πληροφορίες 
(που χρησιμοποιούν τον TV-ODIGO', τον τηλεφωνικό κατάλογο, 
Διαδίκτυο...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo enseñar a estudiantes sobre la 
información, cómo a transfer/store él, encontrando la información 
(que usa la TV-GUI'A, el phonebook, el Internet...)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Programm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
